This is a demo page. Launch debug tools and enjoy scripting !

Possibilities overview

    var session = new Session('http://localhost:7999');
    session.listDB().then(console.log);
    session.database = 'tryton';
    session.start('admin', 'admin').then(console.log);
    session.rpc('model.res.user.search', [{}]).then(console.log);
    session.rpc('model.res.user.read', [[1]]).then(console.log);

Usually, due to security policy, the browser refuses the server response (Cross-origin resource sharing). This can be bypassed by a browser extension or commandline options.
